document.getElementById(\\\"formio-btnclk-submit\\\").innerHTML=(clickCountsubmit+1);\",\"input\":true}]}' WHERE NAME='EaseMappingForm' and organization='leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT Distinct t.[number],[Name],t.assignmentgroup,[Shift] as currentShift, convert(varchar, [DATE], 101) AS DATE FROM @projectname_useravailability roster JOIN @projectname_rosterdefinition def ON cast(def.shiftName as varchar)=roster.[shift] JOIN @projectname_tickets_enriched e ON roster.[Name]= e.predicted_assignee JOIN @projectname_tickets t ON e.Number = t.number WHERE predicted_assignee IS NOT NULL AND cast(userAvailable as varchar)=''1'' AND convert(varchar, [DATE], 101)= FORMAT(GETDATE(), ''M/d/yyyy'') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, ShiftStart, 108) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 108) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, ShiftEnd, 108) > CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 108) ","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","Headers":"","defaultValues":"","QueryParams":"","writeMode":"append","params":"{}","tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":"number"}' WHERE Name = 'LEOCRNTS39013'; UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT Distinct t.[number], [Name],t.assignmentgroup, [Shift] as NextShift, convert(varchar, [DATE], 101) AS DATE FROM @projectname_useravailability roster JOIN @projectname_rosterdefinition def ON cast(def.shiftName as varchar)=roster.[shift] JOIN @projectname_tickets_enriched e ON roster.[Name]= e.predicted_assignee JOIN @projectname_tickets t ON e.Number = t.number WHERE predicted_assignee IS NOT NULL and cast([Shift] AS varchar)=(SELECT cast(reassignedShift AS varchar) AS NextShift FROM @projectname_rosterdefinition WHERE convert(varchar,ShiftStart,108) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 108) AND convert(varchar,ShiftEnd,108) > CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 108) AND userAvailable=1) AND convert(varchar, [DATE], 101)= FORMAT(GETDATE(), ''M/d/yyyy'') ","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","Headers":"","defaultValues":"","QueryParams":"","writeMode":"append","params":"{}","tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":"number"}' WHERE Name = 'LEONXTSH17485';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"select number, predicted_assignee AS Assignee from @projectname_tickets_enriched where predicted_assignee is not null ","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","Headers":"","defaultValues":"","QueryParams":"","writeMode":"append","params":"{}","tableName":"@projectname_tickets_enriched","uniqueIdentifier":""}' WHERE Name ='LEOASGND51842'
